header.name: chaos/preprocessor/logical/bitxnor.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a logical XNOR operator.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to the logical XNOR of its operands.

usage.param: The left operand. Valid values are 0 and 1.
The right operand. Valid values are 0 and 1.

macro.para: If either x or y is 1 exclusively, this macro expands to 0. Otherwise, it expands to 1.
This macro does not perform a Boolean conversion on its operands. If this conversion is desireable, may be used instead.
